item.content:encoded: Updated the Comic Book Review Machine with review listings for Blue Spring and Or Else #2. If you're a comic book reviewer and would like your reviews added to our database (for free!), just email brian.kirsten.bss@gmail.com with your information.
item.excerpt:encoded: Updated the Comic Book Review Machine with review listings for Blue Spring and Or Else #2. If you're a comic book reviewer and would like your reviews added to our database (for free!), just email brian.kirsten.bss@gmail.com with your information.
